results.title: [Turkey: agriculture]
results.brief_description:
A documentary on Turkish agriculture showing how machinery for farming has only recently been introduced although more primitive methods still persist. Shows tobacco farming; the farming and processing of figs and raisins; State Agriculture Institute and their interest in improving livestock; veterinary school with its own radio station; annual agriculture fair.
NB: Reel 2 only
results.description:

results.title: [Tony Agapitos: Preparations for Miss Greek Charity Quest]
results.brief_description:
This film shows a small fundraiser and social occasion with Greek youth holding a raffle, barbecue and dance. Money raised supported the Miss Greek Charity Quest, for which the preparations can be seen.

This film is part of a collection of 16mm films made by Tony Agapitos. The collection offers a glimpse at Greek migrant life in Victoria from the 1950s to the 1970s.
